name: Wobbling in the Dark
description:
It is dark outside.  Wobbling has agreed to recover the Night Gems that were stolen from the village by BiggBigg and his crew.  With the help from his friend Frecklez they might just have a chance.

Come join Wobbling in this 2D adventure as he walk down a dark path, at night time, where he knows he will most likely face a lot of BiggBigg's crew.
